ImagemagickDriver package¶

config module¶

dcc_jp2_converter.modules.ImagemagickDriver.config.get_imagemagick_path()¶
Attempts to retrieve the location to Imagemagick convert command. If a
path is specified in the settings ini file, that path will be used. Otherwise, the function will search for it on the path.
Returns:Full path to Imagemagick convert command if found.

ImagemagickCommandBuilder¶

class dcc_jp2_converter.ImagemagickCommandBuilder(builder: dcc_jp2_converter.modules.ImagemagickDriver.imagemagickCommandBuilders.abs_builder.AbsBuilder = <dcc_jp2_converter.modules.ImagemagickDriver.imagemagickCommandBuilders.default_command_builder.DefaultCommandBuilder object>, program_path='/usr/local/bin/convert')¶

Use this to generate commands for sending to imagemagick

__init__(builder: dcc_jp2_converter.modules.ImagemagickDriver.imagemagickCommandBuilders.abs_builder.AbsBuilder = <dcc_jp2_converter.modules.ImagemagickDriver.imagemagickCommandBuilders.default_command_builder.DefaultCommandBuilder object>, program_path='/usr/local/bin/convert')¶

Configure how the director should configure the builders. All args are for overriding the defaults.

Parameters:
  • builder – Choose which typo of command builder to user. By default, it uses the DefaultCommandBuilder.
  • program_path – Override the location of imagemagick’s convert utility.
build_command(src: str, dst: str) → list¶

Builds an imagemagick command

Parameters:
  • src – Path to the source file
  • dst – Path and file name to save a new file
Returns:

Returns a new command in list format.

Examples

If no builder type is given as an argument to the Exiv2CommandBuilder, Imagemagick with infers the desired type based on the file extension of the destination file.

SOURCE_FILE_NAME = "/Users/hborcher/Documents/471223_037.tif"
DESTINATION_FILE_NAME = "/Users/hborcher/Documents/output.jpg"

command_builder = ImagemagickCommandBuilder()
command_builder.build_command(src=SOURCE_FILE_NAME, dst=DESTINATION_FILE_NAME)

# This returns the following value
# ['/usr/local/bin/convert', '/Users/hborcher/Documents/471223_037.tif', '/Users/hborcher/Documents/output.jpg']
